name: Marriott International
summary: Marriott International is a global hospitality company that operates and franchises hotels, resorts, and lodging properties. It owns and manages over 8,500 properties across 30+ brands, including Marriott, Ritz-Carlton, Sheraton, Westin, and St. Regis. Marriott specializes in luxury, business, and budget accommodations, offering services in lodging, event hosting, and travel experiences.
